title: Oral hygiene: Johnnie and the D.K. robot
creator_credit: Larkin Studios and Film Producers Guild
brief_description: The importance of brushing teeth before going to bed, told in a dream which involves a little boy, a trip into space, and a D.K. Robot. On the planet Yum-Yum where sweets grow on trees, the children lose their teeth until Johnnie introduces them to toothbrushes and toothpaste. Animation and live footage.
